(411x243+287)/64 mod 512 = 29. (411x729+925)/128 mod 256 = 44. (411x729+925)/256 mod 128 = 22. (411x729+925)/512 mod 64 = 11. (411x2187+3287)/1024 mod 32 = 17. (411x6561+10885)/2048 mod 16 = 10. (411x6561+10885)/4096 mod 8 = 5. (411x19683+36751)/8192 mod 4 = 0. (411x19683+36751)/16384 mod 2 = 0. (411x19683+36751)/32768 mod 1 = 0.
